Unfortunately there will be no season 3.  This is the end of Avengers Earth's Mightiest Heroes and I'm kinda sad to see it go.  There will be a new series called "Marvel's Avengers Assemble"  Black panther, Ant man and Wasp will not be a part of the Avengers this time around.  The cast for this cartoon will consist of the characters in the movie, with the addition of Falcon.  

Very sad as I loved the Voice actors and show in general, but we can only hope the new Avengers will be good.  Thanks so much for bringing these to us.  

RIP Avengers: Earth's Mightiest Heroes  :*(
